LatestNewsLargeTxt: New update is in the works!
LatestNewsDescription:
Hey people, wanted to announce that Era V2.1 is on the way, with many news and gameplay features to be added, most importantly 1.7.2+ support! Stay safe, more news will come.



BACKEND-NOTICE:
Era is now running with a custom backend.
Custom backend made by: secret_pommes#1337
Source of custom backend:
https://github.com/secret-pommes/ERA-Backend
